item.title: Exercises in linear algebra
item.author: lyu@xllyu.org (Xinliang Lyu)
item.description: Page created on 19 July 2024 Last modified on 20 July 2024 I. Eigenvalue problems As a review, the eigenvalue problem of a given matrix $\mathbf{M}$ is I.1 Eigenvalues of a symmetric matirx We haven’t talked about how to solve the eigenvalue problem from scratch. So, here, we write down a matrix and I will tell you the eigenvectors. You try calculting the corresponding eignevalues. Here is the matrix and I tell you its two eigenvectors are Please calculate the corresponding eigenvalues.
